amendment.description: To revise language regarding cluster munitions.
amendment.purpose: To revise language regarding cluster munitions.

action.text: Amendment SA 129 was modified to be submitted to Amendment SA 26 (previously to Amendment SA 62) by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 129 proposed by Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 26.

vote.text: Amendment SA 129 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
